description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0776 ( Item Status)
name: v2 Item Status

text.div:
Item Status

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
A ActiveItem is available to be purchased or issued.added v2.6
I InactiveItem is not available to be purchased or issued.added v2.6
P Pending InactiveItem is not available to be purchased, but is available to be issued.added v2.6
